userreviews.userReview: It was actually really good. Tried it whilst waiting for The Undead Day Eighteen. It caught my attention from the moment he entered the house...
Brilliant New incredible characters - whilst waiting for the next undead instalment I have read rr Haywood’s other books - all as superb with incredible depth of characters
I gave it five stars....but then I wrote it so I would say that really!!! R.R Haywood

description: Mike Humber, a down on his luck ex-detective gets a job offer he can’t refuse and when things seem too good to be true... they probably are.Huntington House: A Psychological sexy brutal twisting thriller that keeps you nailed to your seat.
title: Huntington House: A Mike Humber Detective Novel
